content: Starting with our core component business, so we produced and delivered 129,686 drivetrain units in 2022, representing $90.8 million in revenue, of which 27,542 drivetrain units were in the fourth quarter, resulting in $19.1 million in revenue. So let's take a company like United Rentals, for example, the way that we see it playing out is after the initial demo phase, then it'll transition to a full on pilot, where you are will purchase between, let's say, 50 to 150 units of our particular product, to do a full deep dive, 12 months pilot study on our product live in market to get a better understanding of profit margins, maintenance costs, the Scotiabank. Thank you, very much. Thank you, very much. Thank you, very much.
